entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-d'Espoir 9:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
